SELECT WRD_NM AS name , DOC_CNT AS value FROM ( SELECT YY.WRD_NM, COUNT(XX.CLC_DOC_NUM) AS DOC_CNT FROM ( SELECT X.CLC_DOC_NUM FROM BIG_TPC_TXT_ANAL X, BIG_TPC_RST Y, BIG_TPC_MST M WHERE X.CLC_DOC_NUM = Y.CLC_DOC_NUM AND Y.ASK_NUM = M.ASK_NUM
AND X.WRD_NM = #{keyword}
AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' ) XX, BIG_TPC_TXT_ANAL YY WHERE XX.CLC_DOC_NUM = YY.CLC_DOC_NUM
AND YY.WRD_NM NOT IN (#{keyword}, '문화','체육','관광')
GROUP BY YY.WRD_NM ORDER BY COUNT(XX.CLC_DOC_NUM) DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM < 301
WHERE ROWNUM < 6
